from the previous lesson, summarize() is the most powerful manipulations to apply to grouped data
```{r}
library(dplyr)
cran <- tbl_df(mydf)
rm("mydf")
cran
```

To group cran by the "package" variable:
```{r}
by_package <- group_by(cran, package, add=FALSE)
by_package
```
